{"games":[{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"Gamer Robot | youtube.com/GamerRobot","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1759031,"totalDownVotes":110946,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[🔥 🔵 UPDATE] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":172695,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔥 🔵 UPDATE 17 Part 2 OUT NOW 
New awakening, new island, new boss raid, new weapon, and LOTS MORE! 

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 2300
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Kilo, Smoke, Spin, Flame, Falcon, Ice, Sand, Dark, Revive, Diamond, Light, Love, Magma, Door, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier, String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Shadow, Venom, Control, Soul, and Dragon.

FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":9213039,"creatorName":"Sulley","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":855130,"totalDownVotes":59721,"universeId":2324662457,"name":"[UPD 26] Anime Fighters Simulator","placeId":6299805723,"playerCount":103712,"imageToken":"T_6299805723_c6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Anime Fighters!

🔨More updates upcoming!","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2684415,"totalDownVotes":345955,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🏰High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":52118,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":724621,"totalDownVotes":321587,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":34847,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":351786,"totalDownVotes":65405,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ISHTAR] ABA","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":20305,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"ANIME BATTLE ARENA

Cr Some Clothing: Blotnik","genre":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":3903751,"totalDownVotes":483499,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":20405,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Lock and Load with the exclusive Virtual Nomad Bundle through Prime Gaming and unlock six unique functionalities: Character Skin, Custom Emote, Weapon Skin, Elimination Effect, Melee Weapon, and Calling Card

1) Log in to your account on roblox.com
2) Go to roblox.com/redeem and enter your code.
3) Your item can be equipped from within the Avatar Editor. Enjoy!

After you redeem the offer on roblox.com/redeem, launch Arsenal on Roblox, open the Prime Gaming pop-up, and select “Redeem Item” to receive the bonus rewards. Then, go into your Locker to equip th

Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons! 

Conquer the day in fast paced arcade gameplay, from bazookas to spell books, each weapon will keep you guessing on what's next! 

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!

Join the ROLVe Community group for an in-game chat tag and 25% more BattleBucks and XP!","genre":""},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4917885,"totalDownVotes":662790,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":20984,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Another update for you! Out now! 
🚀 - FAST TRAVEL JETS! Book a private flight to quickly travel around the map!

🎯 - Damage direction indicators!

🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over five billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089","genre":""},{"creatorId":11257245,"creatorName":"InfinityInteractive","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":512131,"totalDownVotes":36738,"universeId":2788648141,"name":"[UPDATE] Military Tycoon","placeId":7180042682,"playerCount":23111,"imageToken":"T_7180042682_9444","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"VAULT HEIST UPDATE 2! NEW ARMOUR, KNIFE, AND ESCAPE ROUTE!

Leave a like 👍 and favorite ⭐ for more Military Tycoon updates! 
Military Tycoon progress and gamepasses automatically save. 💾 

Military Tycoon is a military themed shooter where you can play as a country and take over the world! Fight with a military grade arsenal, and wage warfare with an ever expanding vehicle list of helicopters, tanks, and boats! Conquer oil rigs and control points to boost your nation's earnings. Updates are always on the way! 

Join InfinityInteractive for a free MP9, be the first to hear about Military Tycoon updates, leave suggestions, and much more! - https://www.roblox.com/groups/11257245/InfinityInteractive#!/about
